Description: Conical foot sherd of Chian, possibly Simple Animal Style patterned, pottery chalice; white slip; exterior: glazed streaky black (fired reddish in places); inscription on reserved underside.
Curator's comments: For parallels regarding squat patterned chalices, see Lemos no. 1062 from Kamiros. the number 773 is written in pencil on the underside of the foot.
Bibliographic references: Johnston 2006a / Trademarks on Greek Vases: Addenda (p. 171, no. 62)
Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GD.1142) (phase 2)
